job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly relates to understanding business context and aligning technical work with strategic objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes the process of converting business requirements into technical specifications.
This task involves understanding the business landscape to find areas where new tools can be beneficial.

job_tasks.phrase: assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding customer needs and business value to support sales efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide unique insight into customer needs, product requirements and strategic opportunities
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand customer needs and business strategy to influence product direction.

job_tasks.phrase: Gain the reputation as a trusted advisor with our field teams and customers
job_tasks.justification: Being a trusted advisor implies understanding and aligning with the business needs and goals of both internal teams and customers.
Data modeling is a core component of data engineering, involving the design of data structures.
Data conversion is a task within data engineering that involves transforming data from one format to another.

job_tasks.phrase: evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects
job_tasks.justification: This phrase encompasses the creation, testing, and implementation of tools, which aligns with modeling activities in the context of applying them.

job_tasks.phrase: contributing to the development of tooling prototypes
job_tasks.justification: Developing prototypes of tools involves creating and testing new functionalities, a form of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: POCs including developing or extending existing tools when necessary and appropriate for customer success
job_tasks.justification: Creating Proofs of Concept (POCs) by developing or extending tools directly involves building and testing models or tool functionalities.
Testing products to assess their functionality and suitability for customer use cases is a form of evaluation and modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: developing a playbook for customer application modernization engagements
job_tasks.justification: Developing a playbook involves structuring and defining processes and best practices, which can be considered a form of modeling workflows.
Code conversion is a direct software development task.
These are standard software development lifecycle activities.
Integration and release configuration are essential parts of software development and deployment.
While overlapping with MLOps, 'production operations' in this context refers to the operational aspects of the application itself, aligning with software development.
Optimizing applications is a software development task focused on performance and efficiency.
Adopting best practices is crucial for robust software development.
Applying tools within projects is a software development activity to solve problems or achieve outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: facilitating the usage of such tools and processes across the different project teams
job_tasks.justification: This involves enabling and guiding the use of tools within development projects, a collaborative software development effort.
Choosing tools for integration into software projects is a software development decision.
Directly refers to the creation of tools within a software development context.
This is a clear software development activity focused on tool creation and modification.

job_tasks.phrase: helping to shape the product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to a product roadmap involves influencing the direction of software development and features.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences
job_tasks.justification: This describes communication of technical solutions, a key aspect of software development lifecycle and stakeholder management.
While 'production operations' can be broad, in the context of managing tools and applications, it strongly implies operational responsibilities for systems in production.
Optimization can also fall under MLOps when it pertains to improving the performance and efficiency of models or applications in production.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with Product and Engineering teams
Work as part of a wider delivery team
Collaborate with the Product development team
Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences
evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects
contributing to the development of tooling prototypes
Personally execute well-defined, outcome-focused projects, POC, MVP and everything in between.
Maintain a broad and deep technical understanding of the product line
Provide unique insight into customer needs, product requirements and strategic opportunities
exploring the possibilities of Generative AI technologies
influencing the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap
helping to shape the product roadmap
Gain the reputation as a trusted advisor
Contribute to the success of customer application migration initiatives

classification.rationale: While the job mentions 'Generative AI technologies' and 'tooling', it heavily emphasizes traditional software development, application modernization, and working with existing products like MongoDB. There is no explicit mention of building or fine-tuning LLMs, RAG systems, or developing complex agents, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. The focus is on applying existing tools and improving software development processes rather than developing AI models themselves.
